001package com.telos.loops.transport;
002
003import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
004import java.util.Arrays;
005import java.util.Map;
006
007/**
008 * Represents an HTTP request to be executed by a transport layer.
009 *
010 * <p>This is an internal abstraction used by the SDK to decouple the public API from the
011 * underlying HTTP client implementation. Users typically don't need to construct these directly.
012 *
013 * @param httpMethod the HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH)
014 * @param url the complete URL to send the request to
015 * @param headers HTTP headers to include in the request (immutable copy is created)
016 * @param body the request body as bytes (immutable copy is created)
017 */
018public record TransportRequest(
019    HttpMethod httpMethod, String url, Map<String, String> headers, byte[] body) {
020
021  public TransportRequest {
022    headers = headers == null ? Map.of() : Map.copyOf(headers);
023    body = body == null ? new byte[0] : Arrays.copyOf(body, body.length);
024  }
025
026  @Override
027  public String toString() {
028    return "TransportRequest{"
029        + "httpMethod="
030        + httpMethod
031        + ", url='"
032        + url
033        + '\''
034        + ", headers="
035        + headers
036        + ", body="
037        + new String(body, StandardCharsets.UTF_8)
038        + '}';
039  }
040}
